alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Olmsted; Wabasha; Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 2:27AM CST until December 27 at 6:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of west central Wisconsin and southeast Minnesota. * WHEN...Snow initially overspreads the area in the early evening hours, mixing with freezing drizzle from west to east before midnight. The freezing drizzle gradually transitions to drizzle and ends from west to east before sunrise on Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, check 511mn.org in Minnesota and 511wi.gov in Wisconsin.
